thread.title: Follow the action from UFC Fight Night: Bermudez vs. Korean Zombie
thread.title_full: Follow the action from UFC Fight Night: Bermudez vs. Korean Zombie

title: Follow the action from UFC Fight Night: Bermudez vs. Korean Zombie
text:
Feb 4, 2017 at 7:51p ET 0Shares 
“The Korean Zombie” Chan Sung Jung returns from more than three years away when he battles rising contender Dennis Bermudez in the main event of UFC Fight Night from Houston. 
Jung spent the last two years fulfilling his mandatory military service in his home country of South Korea but now he’s back to fighting and looking to re-establish himself as a title contender in the 145-pound division. His opponent, Bermudez, is on the cusp of entering the featherweight title picture and a big win over a veteran like Jung will put the rest of the top five on notice. 
In the co-main event, up-and-coming star Alexa Grasso battles Felice Herrig while strawweights Jessica Andrade and Angela Hill kick off the main card in what should be considered a No. 1 contender’s bout. 
The action gets underway at 7PM/4PM ETPT on UFC Fight Pass before moving to FS1 at 8PM/5PM for more prelims action. The main card starts at 10PM/7PM sharp, also on FS1. Keep it here throughout the night for complete coverage of the event and afterwards for all your UFC Houston news, results and analysis.
